• Smantic Stuff

    <header>
    <nav>
    <aside>
    <section>
    <article>
    <footer>

  • Mark

    Do not forget to buy bread today.

    <p>Do not forget to buy <mark>bread</mark> today.</p>

  • Time

    We open at 10:00 every morning.

    You have a date on Valentines day.

    <p>We open at <time>10:00</time> every morning.</p>
    <p>You have a date on <time datetime="20014-02-14">Valentines day</time>.</p>

  • Figure

    <figure>
      <img src="cat1.jpg" alt="Kitten">
    </figure>

  • Fig Caption

    <figure>
      <img src="cat2.jpg" alt="cat_mirror">
      <figcaption>Fig1. - Silly Cat.</figcaption>
    </figure>

  • Details & Summary - Only avaiable on Chrome

    A question - Click for answer

    The answer

    <details>
      <summary>A question - Click for answer</summary>
      <p>The answer</p>
    </details>

  • Datalist

    <input list="browsers">
     <datalist id="browsers">
      <option value="Internet Explorer">
      <option value="Firefox">
      <option value="Chrome">
      <option value="Opera">
      <option value="Safari">
     </datalist>

  • bdi

    • User إيان : 3 posts - Not using <bdi>
    • User إيان : 3 posts - Using <bdi>

    <ul>
      <li>User إيان : 3 posts - Not using <bdi></li>
      <li>User <bdi>إيان</bdi> : 3 posts - Using <bdi></li>
    </ul>

  • wbr

    Allows you to pick where the browsers should line break if its needs to!

    <p>Allows you to pick where <wbr>the browsers should line break <wbr>if its needs to!</p>

  • Dialog

    Hi, I'm a dialog!
    <dialog open>
      <p>Hi, I'm a dialog!</p>
    </dialog>

  • Command - Only avaiable on IE9

    Save
    <menu>
      <command type="command" label="Save" onclick="save()">Save</command>
    </menu>

  • Meter

    2 out of 10
    <meter value="2" min="0" max="10">2 out of 10</meter><br>

  • Progress

    <progress value="22" max="100"></progress>

  • ruby, rt & rp

    漢 (ㄏㄢˋ)
    <ruby>
      漢 <rt><rp>(</rp>ㄏㄢˋ<rp>)</rp></rt>
    </ruby>

  • Keygen

    Username: Encryption:
    <form action="" method="get">
      Username: <input type="text" name="user_name">
      Encryption: <keygen name="key_gen">
      <input type="submit">
    </form>

  • Output

    +

    =

    <form oninput="x.value=parseInt(a.value)+parseInt(b.value)">
      <input type="number" id="a" value="50">
      <input type="number" id="b" value="50">
      <output name="x" for="a b"></output>
    </form>

  • Audio

    <audio controls>
      <source src="path/file.mp3" type="audio/mpeg"/>
      <source src="path/file.ogg" type="audio/ogg"/>
    </audio>

  • Video & Source

    <video width="500" controls>
      <source src="path/file" type=video/webm>
      <source src="path/file" type=video/ogg>
      <source src="path/file" type=video/mp4>
      <source src="path/file" type=video/3gp>
    </video>

  • Track

    <video src="path/file" controls>
      <track kind="subtitles" label="English subtitles" src="path/file" srclang="en" default></track>
    </video>

  • Embed

    <embed src="path/file">

  • Canvas - red background so that you can see it

    Fallback content, in case the browser does not support Canvas.
    <canvas id="myCanvas" width="300" height="150">
      Fallback content, in case the browser does not support Canvas.
    </canvas>
